verbose_text: Unlike deletion of KEAP1 and NAA38, which enhance NRF2 protein levels and the expression of GSH biosynthetic genes, ABCC1 / MRP1 deletion increases the size of the basal intracellular glutathione pool and/or slows the depletion of intracellular glutathione following the inhibition of de novo GSH synthesis.
evidence: ABCC1/MRP1 deletion increases the size of the basal intracellular glutathione pool and/or slows the depletion of intracellular glutathione
